column5: This year with the "new" boat has been great, and my son has loved every minute of it but it was time for the Rice brothers to some fishing. We didn't have a particular species in mind as long as it wasn't panfish.
Looks like a fun day for the Rice Bros. I enjoyed that Rob.
Wow, on a Rappala ice jig if my eyes serve me well.
Cool, I love when that happens.  Confusing at first, but exciting to see when you finally realize what has happened.  Some nice fish there!!
Love when that happens, Looks like a great day on the water
very cool! I had that happen with a smallie and I was able to land the musky on 6lb mono. It was very fun!
Ya my walleye jogging rod is a 6'6 crucial/1000 stratic with 15lb nanofil. T'was fun while it lasted.

Wow that is a great story. I have had many beasts attack fish while ocean fishing but this has yet to happen for me while fishing in Ontario...maybe its because I go straight for the big guy in the first place. Glad to see you got some good fun out of the boat this year!
Jigg,n a smallie for muskie is fun..  Nice brudder/brudder report Rob..
